column4: I have a question about mounting a usb, no where can my system find it, but disk utility can. I've tried to find it with sudo fdisk -1 but it only shows the hard drive. Any help?
what kind of usb device is it? Flash drive? USB HD?
do other devices on usb ports work? I mean, I imply you use a port available on your motherboard here
Id suggest following what escott says then, im still kind of a n00b, was trying to help with the experience I had ^^;
